issue.title: Implement a test helper that allows for unit testing a Controller
Allow specifying a more complete HttpServer configuration
issue.body:
There are pieces of amphp/http-server that can be configured but we do not expose a mechanism to do that. We should adjust the `HttpServerConfiguration` and corresponding `HttpServerFactory` to allow pertinent options to be configured on the created `SocketHttpServer`. Based on initial review of amphp/http-server we'll have to adjust various factories used when creating the `SocketHttpServer`.

## List of Configuration

- [x] Max connections allowed
- [x] Max connections per IP address
- [x] The path to static resources that are served by the app

issue.title: Research designs that allow a `#[ControllerActions]` implementation have before and after hooks

comment.body: This does not need to be implemented as part of the framework directly

commits.message: Ensure session destruction handled by OpenSession middleware (#68)

issue.title: Error when attempting to implicitly save a destroyed Session
issue.body:
If a controller that has been annotated with `#[RequireSession(SessionAccess:Write)]` destroys the underlying session we should not attempt to call `Session::save()` as the session hasn't been locked yet. An additional check should be made to ensure that we only call `Session::save()` on a locked session.

Relevant block of code: https://github.com/labrador-kennel/http/blob/54c39415baeb441a24de1c66d42a11d453c44e8b/src/AmpApplication.php#L91-L97
